entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
